Package org.shared.net

A framework for transparent, scalable networking with asynchronous sockets.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Connection
    Defines a managed connection.
    ConnectionHandler<C extends Connection>
    Defines a handler for Connection callbacks.
    ConnectionManager<C extends Connection>
    Defines a transport layer for managing Connections.
    SocketConnection
    Defines a socket-based Connection.
    SocketManager<M extends SocketManager<M,C>,C extends SocketConnection>
    Defines a socket-based ConnectionManager.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Buffers
    A static utility class for Buffer manipulations.
    Constants
    Contains constant values.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Connection.OperationType
    An enumeration of the managed operations manipulable by the user.
    ConnectionHandler.ClosingType
    An enumeration of the ways in which a connection may be closed.
    ConnectionManager.InitializationType
    An enumeration of the ways in which a connection may be initialized.
    SourceType
    An enumeration of networking Source types.

Package org.shared.net Description

A framework for transparent, scalable networking with asynchronous sockets.
